item.title: I Don't Know: Explicit Modeling of Uncertainty with an [IDK] Token
item.description: Boosting LLM accuracy, a new calibration method using a special [IDK] token explicitly models uncertainty, mitigating hallucinations, and improving factual precision while maintaining knowledge retent…
